work.summary: Lead developer for the 2022 Cigna.com Redesign developing web components and apps used in site-wide initiatives serving millions of visitors, including Medicare, Open Enrollment, and Plan Finder. Development efforts resulted in a 38% increase of traffic to the shopping experience and a 67% reduction of accessibility issues.

details.text: Rebuilt several applications on cigna.com from JavaScript/jQuery and Perl to Lit, TypeScript, AWS Lambda, SES, S3, and Jest.
Created a CI/CD pipeline for repo/monorepo publishing and versioning enabling code reusability and automated version tracking across projects.
Increased component library reusability by 47% by using web standards to overcome encapsulation limitations.
Mentored junior developers in our tech stack and hosted education training sessions for scrum teams.
Automated the medical data entry process by developing a claim form app that gives customers the option to file online using JavaScript/jQuery.

Integrated department's custom elasticsearch wrapper into 7 sites for improved UI and search results using Sass and JavaScript. Developed a Lambda integration to support private indexing for 2 internal sites.
Refactored department’s file search app from Perl to Node.js for improved code maintainability.
Oversaw strategic direction, managed budgets, and conducted interviews for networking positions across 6 offices for the Technology Early Career Program (TECDP).
Managed department’s website migration. Developed filtering tools, designed pages, and collaborated with departments on content management strategies.
Liaison for Incident Response teams. Triaged software upgrade issues to prevent disruptions to critical resolution processes.
Transformed conferencing data into population and historical usage metrics used by the department to make decisions on funding allocations.
Resolved over 2,000 emails in 7 months for conferencing software. Hosted 80 support meetings and 15 training sessions for hundreds of employees.
Organized 30 events for TECDP colleagues to meet with peers, mentors, and leadership.
